/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with modern buildings, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees that add a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below.
